blogs.title: Leif Wenar on Blood Oil
blogs.summary: Should the United States allow its citizens to buy oil from countries run by bad men? Is this a case where morality trumps the usual case for free trade? Leif Wenar, professor of philosophy at King's College, London and author of Blood Oil, talks with E

| Peter Klein |
